About News Research Publications Services

About Me

I am postdoctoral researcher in the Titane team at INRIA and a research engineer at LuxCarta Technology. Before, I obtained my PhD at IGN, the French national mapping agency for my dissertation “Learning Surface Reconstruction from Point Clouds in the Wild”. I also hold an MSc in Geomatics from TU Delft and a BSc in Geodesy from the University of Stuttgart. I have lectured on the topics of photogrammetry and GIS at ENSG.

News

  • [Nov. 2024] Joined LuxCarta Technology as a research engineer
  • [Nov. 2023] Joined INRIA as a postdoctoral researcher
  • [Oct. 2023] Succesfully defended my PhD at IGN
  • [Aug. 2023] 1 paper accepted at ICPR 2023

Research Interests

  • Geometry Processing: surface and volume modeling
  • Computer Vision: point cloud generation and analysis
  • Machine Learning: neural surface and radiance fields
  • Digital Twin: BIM, CityGML, 3D city models
